mapper.select: select pk_datarecord_id, fk_data_id, update_time, update_people from xztjj_demo.d_data_record where pk_datarecord_id = #{pkDatarecordId}
select pk_datarecord_id, fk_data_id, update_time, update_people from xztjj_demo.d_data_record limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into xztjj_demo.d_data_record(fk_data_id, update_time, update_people) values (#{fkDataId}, #{updateTime}, #{updatePeople})

insert into xztjj_demo.d_data_record(fk_data_id, update_time, update_people) values
(#{entity.fkDataId}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.updatePeople})

insert into xztjj_demo.d_data_record(fk_data_id, update_time, update_people) values
(#{entity.fkDataId}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.updatePeople})
on duplicate key update fk_data_id = values(fk_data_id) , update_time = values(update_time) , update_people = values(update_people)

insert into d_data_record
pk_datarecord_id,
fk_data_id,
update_time,
update_people,
#{pkDatarecordId},
#{fkDataId},
#{updateTime},
#{updatePeople},
mapper.update:
update xztjj_demo.d_data_record
fk_data_id = #{fkDataId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_people = #{updatePeople},
where pk_datarecord_id = #{pkDatarecordId}
